creator: hkhui@cse.cuhk.edu.hk
text:
Hi all,
  I'm a new user in Tomcat and want to ask for help. I'm using Tomcat 4.1.18 
with winXP. The problem is that I can access the server from local machine 
only (both localhost/IP as prefix works). I've checked that I didn't 
filter/block my specified port for Tomcat.
  In addition, I migrated from Tomcat 4.0 beta 5 and I could access in this 
old version. Any help/suggestion is appreciated

This is not support forum, it's a bug report tool..

To get support you can use our mail-lists, Read 
<http://jakarta.apache.org/site/mail.html>
creator: nacho@apache.org
